entry.title: Barccsyn poster
entry.summary: Sharing the poster I presented last week in Barccsyn 2021
entry.content:
Tach√°n/ta-daah

Last week I had the pleasure to assist to Barccsyn meeting (Barcelona Computational, Cognitive and Systems Neuroscience). It was cool to have a live event like we used to in pre-pandemic times. There were fewer participants than usual and keynotes were local but all good.

Thanks to the organizers (Alex, Silvana and Diogo) almost everything was smooth despite restrictions etc.

Btw, IEC is beautiful, visit it if you have not yet

Here you can find the poster I presented, which IMO it has way too much text but now it may come in handy.

Cheers!
